Key Match Events: Felicio Milson scored the winning goal in the 93rd minute of extra time
Abdul Mumin failed to clear a cross into the box, leading to Milson's goal
Pre-Game Insights: Angola coach Pedro Goncalves said his experienced team would hurt Ghana
Ghana defender Abdul Mumin failed to clear a cross, allowing Angola to score
Post-Match Reflections: Fans booed the players after Ghana's loss
This was the first time Ghana lost in the Kumasi Sports Stadium since 2000
Miscellaneous Highlights: The goal was scored in the third minute of extra time
The match ended with Ghana 0-1 Angola
